snippet: Brandon Ingram dined and dunked in Philadelphia and did all but demand he become the No. 1 overall pick of the NBA draft....
lead_paragraph: Brandon Ingram dined and dunked in Philadelphia and did all but demand he become the No. 1 overall pick of the NBA draft.

headline.main: 76ers Wait on Simmons as They Work Out Ingram Ahead of Draft
headline.print_headline: 76ers Wait on Simmons as They Work Out Ingram Ahead of Draft
